TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ji’an, title = Ji’an, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ji’an} }

S.FORM: Ji'an (Ci'an go, ) mki sku Hualien. su'unun kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 62.65 km (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 0 km , rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 0.68 km ), 78,633 hi ku su'unun kwara alang hi kya, 29,613 buwan ku kwarakya, tiku sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga 14,299 hi, kyala kwara pinspung s'uli ga 18 . kwara sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga Taywang Gyencumin na Amis, Truku ku smrrhu ku pyux s'uli taya kya. sinpngan sehu s'uli sku sahuy go. ays ptyaw sebu Ji'an ays psgayun 18 ru 23 alang. 23 alang hani ga, Natawran , Pukpuk , Lidaw , Mabuwakay , Cikasuwan , Isaetipan pahikukian , Isawalian pahikukian , Taracan , Citekudan , Cikeliwan , Atonan , Ciripunan , Sarad , Kungkung , Hacining , Fulufuluan , gnaalu , mkibuhw , kiyumi , miyamay , Buner , Sirakesay , Ciyibangcalay .
